summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Qkiss Professional Rotary Tattoo Machine, Rotary Tattoo Motor Gun Tattoo Machine, Torsion Bar Bundle Lining And Shading Tool Tattoo Machine (Brass)
Review Date: 2020/02/19
Store: Qkiss
Product Description: ['This tattoo machine adopts CNC crafted aluminum, Lightweight, durable and exquisite.It contains high quality motor, strong power and stable,long time working without heat. With detachable cover to protect torsion bar bundle. Suitable for Lining and shading. Features: 1. CNC crafted aluminum, Lightweight, durable and exquisite. 2. Contains high quality motor, strong power and stable,long time working without heat. 3. With detachable cover to protect torsion bar bundle. 4. Convenient to change the cam wheel and bar. 5. Suitable for using as both shader and liner. 6. The speed can reach 10000rpm/60s. Specification: Condition: 100% Brand New Item Type: Tattoo Machine Color: Red, Black, Silver Blue(Optional) Voltage: Start at3V, Work at 6-8V Length: Approx.13cm / 5.1in Package Weeight: Approx.188g Package List: 1 x Tattoo Machine 1 x Torsion Bar Bundle']
Average Rating: 2.5
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Qkiss', 'Style': 'Custom', 'Water Resistance Level': 'Water Resistant', 'Number of Pieces': '1', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Product Dimensions': '0.39 x 0.39 x 0.39 inches; 6.35 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'Qkissmc0gpais1w-01', 'UPC': '712979442704'}
Review Text: I originally gave one star, but Qkissi immediately contacted me & fixed my issue. I feel bad for giving the bad review to begin with, I should've just waited a couple days for the company to respond and resolve the issue, I just assumed otherwise. I apologize because this is a great company and they'll work with you.. I won't hesitate to order from them again. That being said, my machine did not come with the "torsion bar bundle" that it says or has pictured & had the wrong cam for the torsion bars to be changed on, but the cam on it can be taken off with a tiny Allen key. For $25 it's still a nice machine and runs very smoothly. Not like the older version you can see in the YouTube video that sounds like crap, this one runs quiet. Qkiss has many other items & I will order from them again. Thank you!
Review Title: Qkiss is a great company IMO. They fixed my issue quick.
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: 200 Pcs Plastic Disposable Tattoo Clip Cord Sleeves Machine Bags Covers Set qsbai
Review Date: 2020/02/24
Store: qsbai
Product Description: ['Specifications: Item Name: Tattoo Machine Covers Material: Plastic Quantity: 200Pcs Size: 12cm x 4.5cm/4.72" x 1.77" (Approx.) It\'s a must have for any professional tattoo artist. Package Included: 200 x Tattoo Machine Covers']
Average Rating: 4.0
Product Details: {'Manufacturer': 'qsbai'}
Review Text: These are pretty small and fit comfortably on my mast tour pen & wireless battery pack I use on it.(one for each) I have to force it over my other pen machined like a rubber that's too small. (I actually have no idea what that's like, I am only guessing)
Review Title: These fit on small pens like the Dragonhawk mast tour
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Yilong Cartridge Tattoo Machine Kit Pen Type with DC 5.5mm Connector Power Supply and 1 Pcs Cartridge Needles Free (red)
Review Date: 2020/12/16
Store: YILONG
Average Rating: 3.9
Product Details: {'Brand': 'YILONG', 'Water Resistance Level': 'Water Resistant', 'Number of Pieces': '1', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '6.5 x 2.8 x 2.2 inches; 10.4 Ounces', 'UPC': '703501426392'}
Review Text: Not a bad machine, mine just had a couple deep gouges in it. Maybe factory damage coming out of the machine. I worked in a davenport machine factory where parts would occasionally get gouged by a tool. It happens. I just wanted a cheyenne machine but won't get what I'm looking for in this machine. if I keep buying cheap machines, I'll never know how the good ones work! I'm saving for a premium machine. Once I have the machine I really want, I'll buy cheap machines to test against the good one.
Review Title: Not bad but I Returned it.
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: DGT Disposable DipFoam 24pcs Box
Review Date: 2021/03/25
Store: DGT Tattoo Supply
Product Description: ["The New designed for cleaning your machine's needles, blending, drying or diluting ink while tattooing, DIPFOAM will help you take your color pallet to a whole new level. DIPFOAM contain a proprietary eco-friendly foam for easy, safe, and responsible disposal"]
Average Rating: 4.5
Product Details: {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '10.39 x 5.75 x 3.78 inches; 4.97 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'DGT-14-1000-24', 'UPC': '793811104912', 'Manufacturer': 'DGT Tattoo Supply'}
Review Text: Better than using water & paper towel! I'm only in the practice stages of tattooing so I actually cut the foam in half & stuff a half in the bottom of a tiny plastic dixie cup to save $$. They work great.
Review Title: Dip foam cups
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------

raw_response:
SUMMARY:
The purchase history reveals a strong focus on affordable yet functional tattoo equipment and supplies, reflecting a price-sensitive consumer motivated by value. Ratings and sentiments indicate a mix of satisfaction and mild disappointment, often resolved positively through customer service interactions, suggesting a willingness to forgive minor product flaws if addressed promptly. The buyer favors products that enhance the tattooing experience, such as tattoo machines, disposable covers, and innovative cleaning solutions. 

Common themes across purchases show a preference for lightweight and durable materials—like CNC crafted aluminum—emphasizing quality while still seeking budget-friendly options. The buyer exhibits a desire to test various tools while aspiring for higher-end machines, indicating a commitment to improving skills and eventual investment in premium products.

Recurring preferences include a strong inclination towards usability and practicality, highlighted by the selection of specific accessories to enhance machine performance (e.g., disposable covers and cleaning tools). Overall, this consumer embodies a pragmatic approach to tattoo supplies, balancing between experimentation with lower-cost products and aspirations for long-term quality investments.

target_interaction.title: Mast Sai
target_interaction.text: Slot of these Chinese machines are made in one factory & distributed to numerous Chinese tattoo companies. You don't need to look around for long to see, but I'll give an example with this machine here. If you check, Hawink & Dragonhawk also have this SAME machine. They all just change the outer appearance, but the inside is EXACTLY the same. So if you're on a budget, your best bet is the Dragonhawk Mast Sai. Same machine for under eighty bucks. Just got one myself & it runs like a champ. So they're ALL good machines. You can just find the same thing way cheaper if you shop around here on Amazon. Sorry Mummy, but if Mast can sell theirs for cheaper & still make profits, so can you.
target_interaction.title_meta: Mummy Rotary Tattoo Pen Tattoo Machine Custom coreless Motor Aluminum Frame 3.2mm and 3.7mm Stroke Length (red)
